entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 11.
